Event.name: Thieves Guild
Event.text: Your team encounters a thieves guild.

event.text: [Lead] intimdates them, and one of them decides to join you.

effect.additionalText: They give you one of their own in return.
They run off with your summon, your team chases them, but they eventually got away.
They win effortlessly, taking any survivors as your slaves.
They win, but with several injuries and no survivors from the thieves guild.
They win, leaving no survivors from the thieves guild.

event.text: [Lead] abducts one and does several experiments on it. [Lead] learns how to inflict Cannibalism on others!

effect.additionalText: Your team wins, [Lead] takes one of the corpses and examines it thoroughly. [Lead] learns how to inflict Cannibalism on others!
Your team loses with several injuries.

Event.name: Forest Deity
Event.text: A gorgeous deity protecting the forest appears before you with eyes is as blue as the sea, lips as red as ruby, and hair as white as snow. She asked, "What are you doing here? What are your intentions?"

choice.text: Convince her that your intentions are pure.

event.text: You lied and tried to convince her that your intentions are good and pure.

effect.additionalText: The deity was easily tricked by your words. She decided to help you and used her powers to make your minions stronger.
The deity was easily tricked by your words. She decided to help you and give you a blessing to make one of your abilities stronger.
The deity cannot be fooled. She caught on to you very quick. As a result, she attacked your minions with a powerful blast of energy, weakening all of them.

choice.text: No time for this chit-chat, just kill her.

effect.additionalText: You managed to defeat the deity but as she was about to die, she used her remaining powers to send a powerful energy laser, killing one of your minions.
You managed to defeat the deity but it was not easy. Your minions took considerable damage.
The deity didn't stand a chance against you. You extracted her powers from her corpse making your minions stronger.

event.text: You used the chaos orb to corrupt her mind and convince her to help you. She taught you one of her healing spells, Single Heal.

Event.name: Oasis Of Purification
Event.text: You see in the distance an oasis. You checked it out.

event.text: Your minions fully immersed themselves in the oasis. They feel so relaxed and light. It's as if their injuries and afflictions are being washed away.
